title: Redesign landing page to match bold purple + iridescent blob hero style

requirements.summary: Replace the current dark gradient hero background with a solid vivid purple (#7B2FFF) full-viewport background
acceptanceCriteria: The landing page hero viewport fills entirely with a vivid purple background color
The purple background is visible immediately on page load without scrolling
No dark or near-black background is shown on the hero section

file_operations.description: Remove scroll-driven gradient animation logic and replace the hero section's background with a solid vivid purple color (#7B2FFF). Remove any dynamic background color calculations based on scrollProgress. Ensure the hero container has a fixed purple background that fills the full viewport height.

Remove or override any CSS rules that apply dark/near-black gradients to the landing page hero section. Add a utility class or update existing hero styles to enforce the solid purple background color.

requirements.summary: Replace the current Web3Blob with a large centrally placed iridescent morphing blob that continuously animates without scroll interaction
acceptanceCriteria: A large 3D morphing blob is centered in the hero section
The blob surface shows iridescent multicolor gradients (pink, teal, yellow, orange tones)
The blob has a glossy, reflective appearance (high specularity/shininess)
The blob continuously animates/morphs without requiring scroll interaction
The blob is rendered over the purple background

file_operations.description: Replace the Web3Blob/ScrollDriven3DScene component with the ContinuousRotatingBlob component. Position the blob canvas at the center of the hero section, layered behind the headline text (lower z-index). Remove scroll-based props and ensure the blob animates continuously on its own. Size the blob to be large and prominent within the hero viewport.

Enhance the blob's material to display vibrant iridescent multicolor gradients (pink, teal, yellow, orange). Increase specularity and shininess properties on the MeshStandardMaterial to achieve a glossy, reflective surface. Ensure the blob continuously morphs and rotates without external input. Adjust point light colors and intensity to emphasize the iridescent effect.

requirements.summary: Display large bold white sans-serif headline text centered horizontally, overlapping the blob in z-order
acceptanceCriteria: A large bold white headline is displayed centered in the hero, overlapping the blob visually
The font is a rounded/geometric sans-serif style at a display size (at least 8rem or equivalent)
The text renders above the blob in z-order

file_operations.description: Update the hero headline to use a large display font size (at least 8rem), bold weight, white color, and a rounded/geometric sans-serif typeface (e.g., Syne or similar). Position the headline absolutely or relatively at the center of the hero with a higher z-index than the blob canvas, ensuring it visually overlaps the blob. Remove any scroll-driven text color or size animations that conflict with the static white appearance.

requirements.summary: Add a minimal top navigation bar with app name on the left and at least one nav link on the right, styled in white on purple
acceptanceCriteria: A top nav bar is visible on the landing page with brand name on the left
At least one nav link appears on the right side
Nav text is white and background is transparent over the purple hero

file_operations.description: Add a minimal top navigation bar component at the top of the Landing page. Position the app name (FitVerse AI or similar) on the left and at least one navigation link (e.g., 'About') on the right. Style the nav text in white with a transparent or purple-tinted background that sits over the purple hero without blocking the view. Use flexbox or grid for horizontal layout.

requirements.summary: Add a circular rotating text badge below the blob with a centered star/sparkle icon
acceptanceCriteria: A circular text badge element is rendered below the blob in the hero
The text rotates slowly as a CSS animation
A small icon (star/sparkle) is centered inside the circular text ring
The element is white/light colored against the purple background

file_operations.description: Create a new CircularTextBadge component that renders a circular text ring with a tagline (e.g., 'AI-POWERED FASHION · PERFECT FIT EVERY TIME ·'). Use SVG or CSS transforms to arrange text characters in a circle. Apply a continuous CSS rotation animation (e.g., rotate 360deg over 20s). Position a small star or sparkle icon at the center of the circle. Style the text and icon in white or light color for contrast against the purple background.

Import and render the new CircularTextBadge component in the hero section, positioned below the blob (either absolutely or in a flex layout). Ensure it is layered above the blob canvas but below or aligned with other hero elements as appropriate.
